title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.3 - Application must be authorized
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.3 - Application must be authorized

State Regulations

Application to this commission must be duly authorized by
appropriate action of the governing body of applicant, or if in the case of a
city such action is deemed unnecessary, the authority for making the
application and of the official signing the same must be
shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
603.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
